mapper.select: WITH BONBU_INFO AS (SELECT cell.ymd, bon.bonbu_cd, bon.bonbu_nm, cell.cell_cnt FROM (SELECT ymd, bonbu_cd, count(*) CELL_CNT FROM LTE_CELL_BAS_DAY WHERE ymd = #{YMD} AND daytime_seq = #{DAYTIME_SEQ} AND bonbu_cd IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ymd, bonbu_cd) CELL, LTE_BONBU_INFO BON WHERE cell.bonbu_cd = bon.bonbu_cd), SOLUTION_INFO AS (SELECT sol.ymd, sol.bonbu_cd, SUM(sol.throughput_cnt) AS THROUGHPUT_CNT, SUM(sol.prb_rate_cnt) AS PRB_RATE_CNT, SUM(sol.ul_if_power_cnt) AS UL_IF_POWER_CNT, SUM(sol.license_fail_cnt) AS LICENSE_FAIL_CNT FROM LTE_SOLUTION_PART SOL WHERE sol.ymd = #{YMD} AND sol.daytime_seq = #{DAYTIME_SEQ} AND sol.rtype_cd = #{RTYPE_CD} GROUP BY sol.ymd, sol.bonbu_cd) SELECT bon.ymd, bon.bonbu_cd, bon.bonbu_nm, bon.cell_cnt AS CELL_CNT, NVL(sol.throughput_cnt,0) AS THROUGHPUT_CNT, NVL(sol.prb_rate_cnt,0) AS PRB_RATE_CNT, NVL(sol.ul_if_power_cnt,0) AS UL_IF_POWER_CNT, NVL(sol.license_fail_cnt,0) AS LICENSE_FAIL_CNT FROM BONBU_INFO BON LEFT OUTER JOIN SOLUTION_INFO SOL ON (sol.bonbu_cd = bon.bonbu_cd) ORDER BY bon.bonbu_cd

WITH PART_INFO AS (SELECT cell.ymd, bon.bonbu_cd, bon.bonbu_nm, team.oper_team_cd, team.oper_team_nm, part.part_cd, part.part_nm, cell.freq_kind, cell.cell_cnt FROM (SELECT ymd, bonbu_cd, oper_team_cd, part_cd, freq_kind, count(*) CELL_CNT FROM LTE_CELL_BAS_DAY WHERE ymd = #{YMD} AND daytime_seq = #{DAYTIME_SEQ} AND bonbu_cd = #{BONBU_CD} AND bonbu_cd IS NOT NULL AND oper_team_cd IS NOT NULL AND part_cd IS NOT NULL GROUP BY ymd, bonbu_cd, oper_team_cd, part_cd, freq_kind) CELL, LTE_BONBU_INFO BON, LTE_OPER_TEAM_INFO TEAM, LTE_PART_INFO PART WHERE cell.bonbu_cd = bon.bonbu_cd AND cell.oper_team_cd = team.oper_team_cd AND cell.part_cd = part.part_cd), SOLUTION_INFO AS (SELECT sol.ymd, sol.bonbu_cd, sol.oper_team_cd, sol.part_cd, sol.freq_kind, SUM(sol.throughput_cnt) THROUGHPUT_CNT, SUM(sol.prb_rate_cnt) PRB_RATE_CNT, SUM(sol.ul_if_power_cnt) UL_IF_POWER_CNT, SUM(sol.license_fail_cnt) LICENSE_FAIL_CNT FROM LTE_SOLUTION_PART SOL WHERE sol.ymd = #{YMD} AND sol.daytime_seq = #{DAYTIME_SEQ} AND sol.rtype_cd = #{RTYPE_CD} GROUP BY sol.ymd, sol.bonbu_cd, sol.oper_team_cd, sol.part_cd, sol.freq_kind) SELECT part.ymd, part.bonbu_cd, part.bonbu_nm, part.oper_team_cd, part.oper_team_nm, part.part_cd, part.part_nm, part.freq_kind, part.cell_cnt AS CELL_CNT, NVL(sol.throughput_cnt,0) AS THROUGHPUT_CNT, NVL(sol.prb_rate_cnt,0) AS PRB_RATE_CNT, NVL(sol.ul_if_power_cnt,0) AS UL_IF_POWER_CNT, NVL(sol.license_fail_cnt,0) AS LICENSE_FAIL_CNT FROM PART_INFO PART LEFT OUTER JOIN SOLUTION_INFO SOL ON (part.bonbu_cd = sol.bonbu_cd AND part.oper_team_cd = sol.oper_team_cd AND part.part_cd = sol.part_cd AND part.freq_kind = sol.freq_kind) ORDER BY part.bonbu_cd, part.oper_team_cd, part.part_cd, part.freq_kind
